sub_title: Trading & Supply | Commercials | Shipping & Barges | Digital AI Technology & Innovation | Product & Portfolio Management | Sustainable & Alternate Fuel-Energy Resources {AFR}
summary:
Amal is a dynamic professional with strategic & tactical experience spanning across Trading & Supply, Commercial Operations, Business Product Management & Development, Digital-Emerging & Innovative Technologies - AI  Product Mgmt.,  Program & Project Mgmt., Internship @ Government Organization, Business Delivery & New Service Development that Supports Production, Sales & Marketing, Supply & Demand Mgmt. and Business Operations. 

He is a collaborative, cross-functional professional that has proven this through his commercial & learner mindset, innovative & incubative, and business operations experience working for clients like - Oil & Gas, Renewable Energy, Aerospace, Pharmaceuticals, Performance Material, Safety & Productivity, Technology, and Service Organizations.

He believes in results-driven outcomes with an interlock of strong leadership & network-building relationships. He drives sustained result-oriented, profitable business outcomes and  with strong technical understanding of enterprise engagements gained through hands-on experience.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams in identifying, incubating & delivering new products & services to sustain growth, revenue & profit objectives.

Responsible for assurance of services & deployment of solutions from small-scale incubating footprint to enterprise scale. Gets involved in the entire value chain for products & services from Opportunity Framing & Discovery, Develop & Execute, Scale-Up & Replicate. 

Exceptional interpersonal skills and sustains effective stakeholder relationships. Accomplished at driving high-performance global teams that empower them, enhance morale, and ensured staff development, talent management & employee retention is achieved.

An experienced digital transformation leader with a passion for commerciality, design, technology, innovation & exceptional people for realizing business outcomes. His experience revolves around transforming inefficient & disorganized environments into orchestrated & systematic functions. 

He is a certified Product Manager, Product Owner, Scrum Master & PMP, ITIL Expert, SAFe Agilist, IoT, Six Sigma Green Belt & Lean IT. With an MBA and Executive Program in Global Business Management - moving businesses from developed regions to emerging markets is an add-on skill that leverages in-depth expertise in the international business environment.

You can reach him @ 
Phone #: +91-990-036-0758 / +91 9341120515
Email ID: Amal.Mehrotra@Hotmail.com / Amal092007@gmail.com

treasury_media.title: Energy Companies - Q2 2021 - Financial Results Analysis Snapshot
treasury_media.description:
Energy Companies - Q2 2021 Financial Results Analysis and Snapshot
Financial Insights Results (Q2, 2021) about few Major Energy Companies and its snapshot.
The past year has proven to be challenging in the energy environment and it's not only to Shell but also to other competitors who operate in this Industry.

Although, in the past - operations and supply chain and professionals have shown immense resilience, and here are few financial insights & future cash generation potential looks great

awards.title: Shell - Long Service Awards (LSA)
awards.description: This award in recognition and appreciation of contributions to Shell for completing 5 years of distinguished service (recognition of you completing 5 years).

awards.title: Shell Powering Progress Award
awards.issuer: Shell CEO - Powering Progress Strategy Award

awards.title: Shell - Information & Risk Management Goldstar Award
awards.description: Shell’s Enhanced Anti-Phishing Campaign. To raise awareness of information risks and train resources in recognizing potential threats. It's essential to keeping Shell IT digitally secure. Shell’s CyberDefence Team analyzes all reported emails, neutralizes any phishes and warns other users about the risks.

awards.title: Shell Certificate of Appreciation - Diversity & Inclusion
awards.description:
Received Shell certificate of appreciation in recognition of contribution towards "D&I - enABLE Network" in 2020 as a core team member. Appreciated for passion & exemplary effort towards creating an inclusive and accessible work environment and being an ambassador for people with disabilities.

Special Project - External awareness sessions conducted at SIT, Bangalore, and Amity University, Delhi. 750+ undergrad students are sensitized about Shell India D&I with a focus on disability.
awards.issuer: Shell India Markets Private Limited - SBO Bangalore

awards.title: Shell - VP CIO Award
awards.description: Reduced Bitumen testing time from several days to hours enabling: faster tank release leading to reduced demurrage exposure, Bitumen formulation optimization. Expected cost savings of USD 1.5m per annum.

awards.title: Shell - Special Recognition Award (Shell - SRA)
awards.description: For contribution to Shell Bitumen Project and  helping the team to achieve Shell.ai Award

awards.title: Bronze Award
awards.description: Amal has exceeded expectations with his expertise, customer focus and eagerness to learn which he demonstrated while delivery projects within a short span of joining CPSD.

awards.title: Great Leader and Innovator of Ideas
awards.description:
Amal took the lead on providing a change/task process that streamlined multiple requests for hardware refreshes project and simplified it to track site activity and stage of refresh. He provided ideas, templates and mentored the team to understand the process and implement this into the lifecycle of the Refresh Program. Amal was key to making the Asset Refresh project a success.

Thank you Amal for leadership and ideas on the Change/Task process for Cummins account. Your dedication helped the Cummins account to be managed more efficiently.

— Cynthia M Black

Well Done Amal. Keep up the good work!

— Angel Prem

projects.title: Trained Resources on SCRUM Methodology
projects.description:
Trained 35+ resources on SCRUM concept from India, Australia and United States. Conducted a workshop to implement SCRUM methodology through building a Lego City where different requirements were laid down by product owners.
In order to make the session interactive some photo and video sessions were conducted.

profile_positions.description:
Handling B2B Engagements:
Working for Shell T&S Commercial Operations - Oil & Gas Trading Products under the capacity of Digital Ops. Lead. 
Working towards achieving & driving Shell's Trading & Supply (T&S) leadership vision 2025 program.
Leading Trading Business Commercial Process Architecture for European Market (The Netherlands, Belgium, France, Germany, Switzerland, Luxemburg and smaller territories of Europe} to achieve Shell T&S Leadership vision for 2025.
Defining business requirements from Trading Commercial lens perspective that intersects with Supply Commercial Operations through "Marine Operations (Barge & Vessels/Ships), In-Land Operations (Truck, Rail & Pipelines), Manufacturing & Refinery Production Plan and Inventory & Logistics Management. 
Looking after Middle Distillates Fuels portfolio i.e. Jet-Fuel {A1}, High-Sulphur {HS}, Low-Sulphur {LS}, GTL - Gas to Liquid, Diesel {HS/LS}, Bio-Diesel and Diesel Marine Fuel.
Defined Business Integration & Assurance for Digital Commercial Operations "Internal Marketing, Roadmap, Delivery & Operating Model" for Trading Products Portfolio i.e. markets like "Europe, East {Singapore} & Middle-East Markets {Dubai}".

profile_positions.description:
Worked under the capacity of Senior Under Officer and led a group of young & dynamic 700 cadets.
Initially started as designation "Cadet" and, reached to the highest designation of authority as "Senior Under Officer".
Always felt proud that contributed to bring positive change @ community service in the spirit of selflessness.
profile_positions.title: Senior Under Officer - Part-Time

volunteer_experiences.role: Virtual Project Management & IT Transformation Program
volunteer_experiences.description: New Era of Project Management and an increasing demand of virtual delivery.

Vision: 
Jeevaniya Society strongly believes in the strength of all knowledge systems and wishes to evolve Models of 'Holistic Rural Development' with Swadeshi & Sustainable Perspective by involvement of the inherent knowledge, resource base & strengths of both the Rural & Urban populations.

Mission:
The Society wishes to evolve and promote sustainable and self-reliant "Swadeshi Models" of Holistic Development in our villages.

Objective:
Working towards building a Prosperous & Healthy Society where people can express the best potential of their creative energies.
Propagating the cultivation, processing & marketing of medicinal plants, agricultural products and their use through sustainable model.
http://jeevaniya.net/index.php

volunteer_experiences.role: Volunteer participation to manage U.P. State Taekwondo Championship
volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteer participation in U.P. State Taekwondo Championship to manage operational event and to provide support to all athlete's from local administration. Built a team of N.C.C. (Indian Army) volunteers to manage the event and made a successful presence for seamless event execution

Started my journey from level 0 as Cadet and reached the highest designation with the organization as Senior Under Officer. Lead a team of 700 cadets and managed resource planning, resource allocation, logistics, refreshments like foods/drinks, cadets progression, allocation to camps, social service programs, budget planning, manage delegation & liaison with government officials and conducted educational classes & out-door parades. Lead the team from the front and it was an awesome experience for me to learn & apply all 12 Leadership Qualities and 40 Leadership traits.
